titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Angola
Angola

div.head: Legislation
div.p: There is no legislation governing access to diplomatic archives.

div.head: Location
div.p: National Archives: Rua Pedro Félix Machado, N° 49 R/CH, PO Box: Caixa Postal n° 2468, Luanda.
Ministry of Foreign Affairs: Rua Major Kanhangulo – Luanda.

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Researchers should write to both the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and the National Archives to discover the location of relevant archives.
